titleStmt.title: The second part of Massaniello his body taken out of the town-ditch, and solemnly buried, with epitaphs upon him. A continuation of the tumult; the D. of Guise made generalissimo; taken prisoner by young Don John of Austria. The end of the commotions. By J.H. Esquire.
Revolutioni di Napoli. Part 2. English.
titleStmt.author: Giraffi, Alessandro.
Howell, James, 1594?-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.M. for A. Roper, and T. Dring, and are to be sold by Richard Lownds at the White Lion in S. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: A translation of part 2 of: Giraffi, Alessandro. Le rivolutioni di Napoli.
Reproduction of the original in the Magdalene College (University of Cambridge) Library.

place.placeName: the White Lion in S. Paul's Church-yard
